hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh
RELEASE_VERSION=`ls mepc_app-*.tar |cut -c10- |sed 's/\.tar//'` DEPLOYED=`curl "http://10.0.2.2:4243/containers/json?all=1" |grep -E 'app-(blue|green)'` IS_BLUE=`curl "http://10.0.2.2:4243/containers/json?all=1" |grep 'app-blue'`
if [ "_${DEPLOYED}" = "_1" ]; then TARGET_ENV=blue else if [ "_${IS_BLUE}" = "_1" ]; then TARGET_ENV=blue else TARGET_ENV=green fi fi
curl --data-binary @mepc_app-${RELEASE_VERSION}.tar -H 'Transfer-encoding: chunked' -H 'Content-type: plain/text' "http://10.0.2.2:4243/images/load"
curl -X DELETE "http://10.0.2.2:4243/containers/app-${TARGET_ENV}?force=1" curl --data-binary "{\"Image\":\"mepc/app:${RELEASE_VERSION}\",\"ExposedPorts\":{\"8080/tcp\":{}}, \"Cmd\": [\"/usr/bin/java\", \"-jar\", \"/opt/mepc-server.jar\"]}" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' "http://10.0.2.2:4243/containers/create?name=app-${TARGET_ENV}"
curl --data-binary '{ "Links": [ "db:db" ] }' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' "http://10.0.2.2:4243/containers/app-${TARGET_ENV}/start"
